ClusterId.desc: The identifier (ID) of the cluster that was backed up.

CopyTimestamp.desc: The date and time when the backup was copied from a source backup.

CreateTimestamp.desc: The date and time when the backup was created.

DeleteTimestamp.desc: The date and time when the backup will be permanently deleted.

NeverExpires.desc: Specifies whether the service should exempt a backup from the retention policy for the cluster. True exempts a backup from the retention policy. False means the service applies the backup retention policy defined at the cluster.

SourceBackup.desc: The identifier (ID) of the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

SourceCluster.desc: The identifier (ID) of the cluster containing the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

SourceRegion.desc: The AWS Region that contains the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

TagList.desc: The list of tags for the backup.

Type.desc: The type of backup retention policy. For the DAYS type, the value is the number of days to retain backups.

Value.length: Minimum length of 1. Maximum length of 3.

AwsHardwareCertificate.desc: The HSM hardware certificate issued (signed) by AWS CloudHSM.

ClusterCertificate.desc: The cluster certificate issued (signed) by the issuing certificate authority (CA) of the cluster's owner.

ClusterCsr.desc: The cluster's certificate signing request (CSR). The CSR exists only when the cluster's state is UNINITIALIZED.

HsmCertificate.desc: The HSM certificate issued (signed) by the HSM hardware.

ManufacturerHardwareCertificate.desc: The HSM hardware certificate issued (signed) by the hardware manufacturer.

BackupRetentionPolicy.desc: A policy that defines how the service retains backups.

Certificates.desc: Contains one or more certificates or a certificate signing request (CSR).

CreateTimestamp.desc: The date and time when the cluster was created.

Hsms.desc: Contains information about the HSMs in the cluster.

HsmType.desc: The type of HSM that the cluster contains.

PreCoPassword.length: Minimum length of 7. Maximum length of 32.
PreCoPassword.desc: The default password for the cluster's Pre-Crypto Officer (PRECO) user.

SecurityGroup.desc: The identifier (ID) of the cluster's security group.

SourceBackupId.desc: The identifier (ID) of the backup used to create the cluster. This value exists only when the cluster was created from a backup.

StateMessage.desc: A description of the cluster's state.

SubnetMapping.desc: A map from availability zone to the clusterâ€™s subnet in that availability zone.

TagList.desc: The list of tags for the cluster.

VpcId.desc: The identifier (ID) of the virtual private cloud (VPC) that contains the cluster.

CreateTimestamp.desc: The date and time when both the source backup was created.

SourceBackup.desc: The identifier (ID) of the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

SourceCluster.desc: The identifier (ID) of the cluster containing the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

SourceRegion.desc: The AWS region that contains the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

AvailabilityZone.desc: The Availability Zone that contains the HSM.

ClusterId.desc: The identifier (ID) of the cluster that contains the HSM.

EniId.desc: The identifier (ID) of the HSM's elastic network interface (ENI).

EniIp.desc: The IP address of the HSM's elastic network interface (ENI).

StateMessage.desc: A description of the HSM's state.

SubnetId.desc: The subnet that contains the HSM's elastic network interface (ENI).

Key.length: Minimum length of 1. Maximum length of 128.

Value.length: Minimum length of 0. Maximum length of 256.
